primevc.gui.effects.UIElementEffects

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
Container with empty slots for effects that will be bound to events that happen in an IUIElement.

Constructor

new(target : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement)

Instance Variables

hide(default,setHide) : EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'hide' method of the target is called. This effect will stop the 'show' effect if it's playing.

move(default,setMove) : EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the coordinates of the targets layoutobject have changed.

resize(default,setResize) : EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the size of targets layoutobject is changed.

rotate(default,setRotate) : EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'rotate' method of the target is called.

scale(default,setScale) : EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'scale' method of the target is called.

show(default,setShow) : EffectInstanceType

Effect that is performed when the 'show' method of the target is called. This effect will stop the 'hide' effect if it's playing.

target(default,null) : primevc.gui.core.IUIElement

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

inline playHide() : Void

playMove() : Void

playResize() : Void

inline playRotate(endV : Float) : Void

inline playScale(endSx : Float, endSy : Float) : Void

inline playShow() : Void
